description: Determination as to whether prior approval is required to install a 15m monopole supporting 6no. antennas and 2no. 300mm dishes, the installation of 2no cabinets and ancillary works thereto, all within 7no concrete bollards.
site_name: Telecommunication Pole And Cabinet Ctil 240327 At Tooting Common Depot
application_type_full: Prior Approval: Development for electronic communications network
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposed telecommunications mast and associated equipment would, by reason of its siting and appearance, be of an overly dominant, overbearing and visually intrusive scale and design, harming the visual amenities and spatial character of the locality, and the setting and character of the Locally Listed Tooting Common Metropolitan Open Land, and the adjoining Heaver Estate Conservation Area. The proposal would not meet with the relevant conditions attached to Class A of Part 16 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order and would be contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies SI6 and G3 of the London Plan (2021) and policies LP1, LP2, LP3, LP22 and LP53 of the Wandsworth Local Plan (2023).
